* [FAQ](https://cityofhallettsville.org/faq/)


Below, for your convenience, are a few frequently asked questions.  For more information and for answers to questions that are not listed here, feel free to contact City Hall at (361) 798-3681.

*What are City Hall’s hours of operation?*

The City Hall lobby is open to customers from 9 A.M. to 4 P.M., and the City Hall phones are answered from 8 A.M. to 4:30 P.M. Monday through Friday, excluding holidays.

*Where is City Hall located?*

City Hall is located on Hallettsville’s historic square at 101 N. Main Street, Hallettsville, TX 77964.

Normally, cut-off day occurs on the 18th day of the month, this can vary depending on if the 18th day of the month falls on a weekend or a holiday.

*When is the last day I have to pay my utility bill?*

Normally, the last day to pay your utility bill is the 17th day of the month,  this can vary depending on if the 17th day of the month falls on a weekend or a holiday.

The transfer station hours of operation are: Monday, 8 A.M – 4 P.M., Wednesday & Saturday, 8 A.M. – 12 P.M.

The transfer station is located at 804 County Road 201, Hallettsville, TX. (
**[MAP](https://maps.google.com/maps?t=h&ll=29.453494499999987%2C-96.9060797&q=Hallettsville+Transfer+Station%2C+County+Road+201%2C+Hallettsville%2C+TX&spn=0.004241916194246585%2C0.006495394203451034&output=classic)**
